title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
content: I know there are few extensions developed by forum members to check different information about users. But my mind is totally blank about how to find them. Can anyone forward me to the links please.Cheers,

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.created_time: January 02, 2023, 02:50:03 AMLast edit: January 02, 2023, 03:11:36 AM by Helena Yu
comments.body: This one Bitcointalk Mobile Friendly App for Android This is more complete, just pick what you want List of Bitcointalk.org Userscripts/ Add-ons

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: No, I need those to check who is banned, take personal note etc.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on January 02, 2023, 02:53:18 AMNo, I need those to check who is banned, take personal note etc.For personal note [Script] BitcoinTalk User NotesTo see who's got banned [β] BPIP Extension: user info & extra features add-on/extension, Firefox/Chrome

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on January 02, 2023, 03:12:35 AMFor personal note [Script] BitcoinTalk User NotesTo see who's got banned [β] BPIP Extension: user info & extra features add-on/extension, Firefox/ChromeThank you. You have my attention next time :-)
